General.Name: EISO Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: EISO Enterprise Co., Ltd. develops and sells printed circuit board products. Its products are used in industrial computers, internet communication products, cars, computer equipment, electron products, power boards, and others. The company also provides LED products for use in professional cycles; and electronic parts. In addition, it engages in the development and sale of real estate properties. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 2, Zhonghua Lane, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333
